properties.Address: Abberley Park, 15 Abberley Crescent, St Albans, Christchurch
properties.Features: This small hall is set a pretty heritage park and suitable for public meetings, dance classes and social events.

properties.Address: Akaroa Recreation Ground, Rue Lavaud, Akaroa

properties.Address: Avebury Park, 9 Eveleyn Couzins Avenue, Richmond, Christchurch
properties.Features: A community facility with three large and four smaller rooms - perfect for classes, programmes, meetings, events and functions.

properties.Facilities: Commercial grade kitchen, overhead projector, whiteboards, tables and chairs on site

properties.Building: Avice Hill Arts and Craft Centre

properties.Facilities: Chairs, tables, two sinks, oven, projector screen and heater on site
